<a id="Invoke-ApiGet"></a>
# **Invoke-ApiGet**
> void Invoke-ApiGet<br>
> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[-Authorization] <String><br>
> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[-Accept] <String><br>
> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[-XVaultAPIClientID] <String><br>

Retrieve API Versions

### Example
```powershell
$Authorization = "{{sessionId}}" # String |  (optional)
$Accept = "application/json" # String |  (optional)
$XVaultAPIClientID = "{{clientId}}" # String | Include a Client ID to identify this request. This ID appears in the API Usage Logs, which is avaiable to download from Admin > Logs > API Usage Logs or through the Vault REST API with the Download Daily API Usage request. If omitted, the value will appear as `unknown` in the API Usage Log. (optional)

# Retrieve API Versions
try {
```
